Posts.Content: Feb 1, 2017 12:04AM eemaxx wrote: 42, just diagnosed in Dec, 2016 after my yearly mammogram showed some calcifications that were "probably benign". Glad I had the stereotactic biopsy because it was not benign. Fortunate to have caught it early though.
Posts.Title: Would you mind sharing your age at time of diagnosis? ByFaith Gussy
